name: Mazy's Great Escape
description:
This is a game about Mazy who walks up in a castle she has never seen before the goal is to escape but the castle seems to be filled with challenges like mazes, moving platforms ,Monsters made up of head and one hand, and more can she make it out , or will she die trying 

Note there will be 30 playable levels and a few secrets levels as of right know there is 1 secret and 8 playable levels
